spec_data.Name: perl-Throwable
spec_data.Description:
Throwable is a role for classes that are meant to be thrown as exceptions
to standard program flow. It is very simple and does only two things: saves
any previous value for $@ and calls die $self.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 05:30:19 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Role for classes that can be thrown
